title: Khloe Kardashian's best friend Malika Haqq just announced she's pregnant
text:
From Cosmopolitan

It looks like baby True Thompson will soon have another friend for playdates - as Khloe Kardashian's best friend Malika Haqq has just announced she's pregnant.

36-year-old Malika, who regularly appears on Keeping Up With the Kardashians and recently released a joint makeup line with Khloe and beauty brand Becca, shared the news on Instagram yesterday (27 September).

Malika chose to announce her pregnancy via a sponsored post on the social network. Partnering with pregnancy test brand Clearblue, Malika posted a photograph of herself holding up a positive pregnancy test stick and a big smile.

"I listen to my heart, and I’ve decided that the rest of my life will be the best of my life. I’m pregnant!" she wrote on the Instagram post.

"I didn't know when, I just knew one day. God said it’s my turn, and I couldn’t be more grateful for the little spirit that grows inside of me. I am yours, baby, and you are mine. Thank you, @Clearblue for being a CLEAR and intricate part of the most important test result of my life. 2020 baby! #ClearblueConfirmed #ClearbluePartner" the post continued.

The Kardashians have been quick to congratulate family friend Malika on her exciting news, with Kendall and Kylie Jenner posting in the comments. Kylie wrote: "So HAPPY😍😍😍😍 love you!!!!!!!!!". Kim Kardashian chimed in too, writing: "I couldn’t be happier for you!!! The best is yet to come".

Khloe also commented on the post - and by the sounds of it she is pretty excited about the new arrival. "Congratulations Mika May!!!!! I am so beyond overwhelmed with love and happiness!!!! God is GREAT!!!! We are all so blessed!!!! I love you and baby madly" she wrote.

Khloe also posted a photo on Instagram of herself with best friend Malika, writing: "My baby is having a baby!!!!!!!! I am literally so so so excited!!!! Congratulations Mika!!! I love you!!!!"

Those exclamation marks are not in short supply, are they!!!!











Malika hasn't shared who the father of her child is, but that hasn't stopped fans speculating in the comments whether it's the reality star's ex-boyfriend, rapper OT Genasis.

"I'm confused. Is this an ad lol, [and] who’s the baby daddy?? So many questions," wrote one person.

"Maybe that OT Genasis guy?" another of Malika's followers replied.

Whether Malika wants to share more details or not about her pregnancy, she deserves all the congratulations.
